comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: The AppVeyor CI run for the branch `SteveL-MSFT-patch-1` failed because the branch was not synced with master and thus it does't have the build fix for the broken dotnet-cli `installscript.ps1`.

title: Update issue-management.md
